00046 void csma::initialize(int stage) {
00047   BaseMacLayer::initialize(stage);
00048 
00049   if (stage == 0) {
00050 
00051     useMACAcks = par("useMACAcks").boolValue();
00052     queueLength = par("queueLength");
00053     sifs = par("sifs");
00054     transmissionAttemptInterruptedByRx = false;
00055     nbTxFrames = 0;
00056     nbRxFrames = 0;
00057     nbMissedAcks = 0;
00058     nbTxAcks = 0;
00059     nbRecvdAcks = 0;
00060     nbDroppedFrames = 0;
00061     nbDuplicates = 0;
00062     nbBackoffs = 0;
00063     backoffValues = 0;
00064     stats = par("stats");
00065     trace = par("trace");
00066     macMaxCSMABackoffs = par("macMaxCSMABackoffs");
00067     macMaxFrameRetries = par("macMaxFrameRetries");
00068     macAckWaitDuration = par("macAckWaitDuration").doubleValue();
00069     aUnitBackoffPeriod = par("aUnitBackoffPeriod");
00070     ccaDetectionTime = par("ccaDetectionTime").doubleValue();
00071     rxSetupTime = par("rxSetupTime").doubleValue();
00072     aTurnaroundTime = par("aTurnaroundTime").doubleValue();
00073     bitrate = par("bitrate");
00074     ackLength = par("ackLength");
00075     ackMessage = NULL;
00076 
00077     //init parameters for backoff method
00078     std::string backoffMethodStr = par("backoffMethod").stdstringValue();
00079     if(backoffMethodStr == "exponential") {
00080       backoffMethod = EXPONENTIAL;
00081       macMinBE = par("macMinBE");
00082       macMaxBE = par("macMaxBE");
00083     }
00084     else {
00085       if(backoffMethodStr == "linear") {
00086         backoffMethod = LINEAR;
00087       }
00088       else if (backoffMethodStr == "constant") {
00089         backoffMethod = CONSTANT;
00090       }
00091       else {
00092         error("Unknown backoff method \"%s\".\
00093              Use \"constant\", \"linear\" or \"\
00094              \"exponential\".", backoffMethodStr.c_str());
00095       }
00096       initialCW = par("contentionWindow");
00097     }
00098     NB = 0;
00099 
00100     txPower = par("txPower").doubleValue();
00101 
00102     droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::NONE);
00103     nicId = getNic()->getId();
00104 
00105     // initialize the timers
00106     backoffTimer = new cMessage("timer-backoff");
00107     ccaTimer = new cMessage("timer-cca");
00108     sifsTimer = new cMessage("timer-sifs");
00109     rxAckTimer = new cMessage("timer-rxAck");
00110     macState = IDLE_1;
00111     txAttempts = 0;
00112 
00113     //check parameters for consistency
00114     cModule* phyModule = FindModule<BasePhyLayer*>::findSubModule(getNic());
00115 
00116     //aTurnaroundTime should match (be equal or bigger) the RX to TX
00117     //switching time of the radio
00118     if(phyModule->hasPar("timeRXToTX")) {
00119       simtime_t rxToTx = phyModule->par("timeRXToTX").doubleValue();
00120       if( rxToTx > aTurnaroundTime)
00121       {
00122         opp_warning("Parameter \"aTurnaroundTime\" (%f) does not match"
00123               " the radios RX to TX switching time (%f)! It"
00124               " should be equal or bigger",
00125               SIMTIME_DBL(aTurnaroundTime), SIMTIME_DBL(rxToTx));
00126       }
00127     }
00128 
00129   } else if(stage == 1) {
00130     BaseConnectionManager* cc = getConnectionManager();
00131 
00132       if(cc->hasPar("pMax") && txPower > cc->par("pMax").doubleValue())
00133             opp_error("TranmitterPower can't be bigger than pMax in ConnectionManager! "
00134                   "Please adjust your omnetpp.ini file accordingly");
00135 
00136       debugEV << "queueLength = " << queueLength
00137     << " bitrate = " << bitrate
00138     << " backoff method = " << par("backoffMethod").stringValue() << endl;
00139 
00140     debugEV << "finished csma init stage 1." << endl;
00141   }
00142 }
00143 
00144 void csma::finish() {
00145   if (stats) {
00146     recordScalar("nbTxFrames", nbTxFrames);
00147     recordScalar("nbRxFrames", nbRxFrames);
00148     recordScalar("nbDroppedFrames", nbDroppedFrames);
00149     recordScalar("nbMissedAcks", nbMissedAcks);
00150     recordScalar("nbRecvdAcks", nbRecvdAcks);
00151     recordScalar("nbTxAcks", nbTxAcks);
00152     recordScalar("nbDuplicates", nbDuplicates);
00153     if (nbBackoffs > 0) {
00154       recordScalar("meanBackoff", backoffValues / nbBackoffs);
00155     } else {
00156       recordScalar("meanBackoff", 0);
00157     }
00158     recordScalar("nbBackoffs", nbBackoffs);
00159     recordScalar("backoffDurations", backoffValues);
00160   }
00161 }
00162 
00163 csma::~csma() {
00164   cancelAndDelete(backoffTimer);
00165   cancelAndDelete(ccaTimer);
00166   cancelAndDelete(sifsTimer);
00167   cancelAndDelete(rxAckTimer);
00168   if (ackMessage)
00169     delete ackMessage;
00170   MacQueue::iterator it;
00171   for (it = macQueue.begin(); it != macQueue.end(); ++it) {
00172     delete (*it);
00173   }
00174 }
00175 
00180 void csma::handleUpperMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00181   //MacPkt *macPkt = encapsMsg(msg);
00182   MacPkt *macPkt = new MacPkt(msg->getName());
00183   macPkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00184   cObject *const cInfo = msg->removeControlInfo();
00185   debugEV<<"CSMA received a message from upper layer, name is " << msg->getName() <<", CInfo removed, mac addr="<< getUpperDestinationFromControlInfo(cInfo) << endl;
00186   LAddress::L2Type dest = getUpperDestinationFromControlInfo(cInfo);
00187   macPkt->setDestAddr(dest);
00188   delete cInfo;
00189   macPkt->setSrcAddr(myMacAddr);
00190 
00191   if(useMACAcks) {
00192     if(SeqNrParent.find(dest) == SeqNrParent.end()) {
00193       //no record of current parent -> add next sequence number to map
00194       SeqNrParent[dest] = 1;
00195       macPkt->setSequenceId(0);
00196       debugEV << "Adding a new parent to the map of Sequence numbers:" << dest << endl;
00197     }
00198     else {
00199       macPkt->setSequenceId(SeqNrParent[dest]);
00200       debugEV << "Packet send with sequence number = " << SeqNrParent[dest] << endl;
00201       SeqNrParent[dest]++;
00202     }
00203   }
00204 
00205   //RadioAccNoise3PhyControlInfo *pco = new RadioAccNoise3PhyControlInfo(bitrate);
00206   //macPkt->setControlInfo(pco);
00207   assert(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00208   macPkt->encapsulate(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00209   debugEV <<"pkt encapsulated, length: " << macPkt->getBitLength() << "\n";
00210   executeMac(EV_SEND_REQUEST, macPkt);
00211 }
00212 
00213 void csma::updateStatusIdle(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00214   switch (event) {
00215   case EV_SEND_REQUEST:
00216     if (macQueue.size() <= queueLength) {
00217       macQueue.push_back(static_cast<MacPkt *> (msg));
00218       debugEV<<"(1) FSM State IDLE_1, EV_SEND_REQUEST and [TxBuff avail]: startTimerBackOff -> BACKOFF." << endl;
00219       updateMacState(BACKOFF_2);
00220       NB = 0;
00221       //BE = macMinBE;
00222       startTimer(TIMER_BACKOFF);
00223     } else {
00224       // queue is full, message has to be deleted
00225       debugEV << "(12) FSM State IDLE_1, EV_SEND_REQUEST and [TxBuff not avail]: dropping packet -> IDLE." << endl;
00226       msg->setName("MAC ERROR");
00227       msg->setKind(PACKET_DROPPED);
00228       sendControlUp(msg);
00229       droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::QUEUE);
00230       emit(BaseLayer::catDroppedPacketSignal, &droppedPacket);
00231       updateMacState(IDLE_1);
00232     }
00233     break;
00234   case EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED:
00235     debugEV << "(15) FSM State IDLE_1, EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED: setting up radio tx -> WAITSIFS." << endl;
00236     //sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacSeqPkt *>(msg)));
00237     delete msg;
00238 
00239     if(useMACAcks) {
00240       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00241       updateMacState(WAITSIFS_6);
00242       startTimer(TIMER_SIFS);
00243     }
00244     break;
00245 
00246   case EV_FRAME_RECEIVED:
00247     debugEV << "(15) FSM State IDLE_1, EV_FRAME_RECEIVED: setting up radio tx -> WAITSIFS." << endl;
00248     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg)));
00249     nbRxFrames++;
00250     delete msg;
00251 
00252     if(useMACAcks) {
00253       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00254       updateMacState(WAITSIFS_6);
00255       startTimer(TIMER_SIFS);
00256     }
00257     break;
00258 
00259   case EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED:
00260     debugEV << "(23) FSM State IDLE_1, EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED: Nothing to do." << endl;
00261     nbRxFrames++;
00262     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg)));
00263     delete msg;
00264     break;
00265   default:
00266     fsmError(event, msg);
00267     break;
00268   }
00269 }
00270 
00271 void csma::updateStatusBackoff(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00272   switch (event) {
00273   case EV_TIMER_BACKOFF:
00274     debugEV<< "(2) FSM State BACKOFF, EV_TIMER_BACKOFF:"
00275     << " starting CCA timer." << endl;
00276     startTimer(TIMER_CCA);
00277     updateMacState(CCA_3);
00278     phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00279     break;
00280   case EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED:
00281     // suspend current transmission attempt,
00282     // transmit ack,
00283     // and resume transmission when entering manageQueue()
00284     debugEV << "(28) FSM State BACKOFF, EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED:";
00285     if(useMACAcks) {
00286       debugEV << "suspending current transmit tentative and transmitting ack";
00287       transmissionAttemptInterruptedByRx = true;
00288       cancelEvent(backoffTimer);
00289       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00290       updateMacState(WAITSIFS_6);
00291       startTimer(TIMER_SIFS);
00292     } else {
00293       debugEV << "Nothing to do.";
00294     }
00295     //sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacSeqPkt *>(msg)));
00296     delete msg;
00297 
00298     break;
00299   case EV_FRAME_RECEIVED:
00300     // suspend current transmission attempt,
00301     // transmit ack,
00302     // and resume transmission when entering manageQueue()
00303     debugEV << "(28) FSM State BACKOFF, EV_FRAME_RECEIVED:";
00304     if(useMACAcks) {
00305       debugEV << "suspending current transmit tentative and transmitting ack";
00306       transmissionAttemptInterruptedByRx = true;
00307       cancelEvent(backoffTimer);
00308 
00309       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00310       updateMacState(WAITSIFS_6);
00311       startTimer(TIMER_SIFS);
00312     } else {
00313       debugEV << "sending frame up and resuming normal operation.";
00314     }
00315     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg)));
00316     delete msg;
00317     break;
00318   case EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED:
00319     debugEV << "(29) FSM State BACKOFF, EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED:"
00320     << "sending frame up and resuming normal operation." <<endl;
00321     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg)));
00322     delete msg;
00323     break;
00324   default:
00325     fsmError(event, msg);
00326     break;
00327   }
00328 }
00329 
00330 void csma::attachSignal(MacPkt* mac, simtime_t_cref startTime) {
00331   simtime_t duration = (mac->getBitLength() + phyHeaderLength)/bitrate;
00332   setDownControlInfo(mac, createSignal(startTime, duration, txPower, bitrate));
00333 }
00334 
00335 void csma::updateStatusCCA(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00336   switch (event) {
00337   case EV_TIMER_CCA:
00338   {
00339     debugEV<< "(25) FSM State CCA_3, EV_TIMER_CCA" << endl;
00340     bool isIdle = phy->getChannelState().isIdle();
00341     if(isIdle) {
00342       debugEV << "(3) FSM State CCA_3, EV_TIMER_CCA, [Channel Idle]: -> TRANSMITFRAME_4." << endl;
00343       updateMacState(TRANSMITFRAME_4);
00344       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00345       MacPkt * mac = check_and_cast<MacPkt *>(macQueue.front()->dup());
00346       attachSignal(mac, simTime()+aTurnaroundTime);
00347       //sendDown(msg);
00348       // give time for the radio to be in Tx state before transmitting
00349       sendDelayed(mac, aTurnaroundTime, lowerLayerOut);
00350       nbTxFrames++;
00351     } else {
00352       // Channel was busy, increment 802.15.4 backoff timers as specified.
00353       debugEV << "(7) FSM State CCA_3, EV_TIMER_CCA, [Channel Busy]: "
00354       << " increment counters." << endl;
00355       NB = NB+1;
00356       //BE = std::min(BE+1, macMaxBE);
00357 
00358       // decide if we go for another backoff or if we drop the frame.
00359       if(NB> macMaxCSMABackoffs) {
00360         // drop the frame
00361         debugEV << "Tried " << NB << " backoffs, all reported a busy "
00362         << "channel. Dropping the packet." << endl;
00363         cMessage * mac = macQueue.front();
00364         macQueue.pop_front();
00365         txAttempts = 0;
00366         nbDroppedFrames++;
00367         mac->setName("MAC ERROR");
00368         mac->setKind(PACKET_DROPPED);
00369         sendControlUp(mac);
00370         manageQueue();
00371       } else {
00372         // redo backoff
00373         updateMacState(BACKOFF_2);
00374         startTimer(TIMER_BACKOFF);
00375       }
00376     }
00377     break;
00378   }
00379   case EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED:
00380     debugEV << "(26) FSM State CCA_3, EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED:";
00381     if(useMACAcks) {
00382       debugEV << " setting up radio tx -> WAITSIFS." << endl;
00383       // suspend current transmission attempt,
00384       // transmit ack,
00385       // and resume transmission when entering manageQueue()
00386       transmissionAttemptInterruptedByRx = true;
00387       cancelEvent(ccaTimer);
00388 
00389       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00390       updateMacState(WAITSIFS_6);
00391       startTimer(TIMER_SIFS);
00392     } else {
00393       debugEV << " Nothing to do." << endl;
00394     }
00395     //sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg)));
00396     delete msg;
00397     break;
00398 
00399   case EV_FRAME_RECEIVED:
00400     debugEV << "(26) FSM State CCA_3, EV_FRAME_RECEIVED:";
00401     if(useMACAcks) {
00402       debugEV << " setting up radio tx -> WAITSIFS." << endl;
00403       // suspend current transmission attempt,
00404       // transmit ack,
00405       // and resume transmission when entering manageQueue()
00406       transmissionAttemptInterruptedByRx = true;
00407       cancelEvent(ccaTimer);
00408       phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00409       updateMacState(WAITSIFS_6);
00410       startTimer(TIMER_SIFS);
00411     } else {
00412       debugEV << " Nothing to do." << endl;
00413     }
00414     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg)));
00415     delete msg;
00416     break;
00417   case EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED:
00418     debugEV << "(24) FSM State BACKOFF, EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED:"
00419     << " Nothing to do." << endl;
00420     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg)));
00421     delete msg;
00422     break;
00423   default:
00424     fsmError(event, msg);
00425     break;
00426   }
00427 }
00428 
00429 void csma::updateStatusTransmitFrame(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00430   if (event == EV_FRAME_TRANSMITTED) {
00431     //    delete msg;
00432     MacPkt * packet = macQueue.front();
00433     phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00434 
00435     bool expectAck = useMACAcks;
00436     if (!LAddress::isL2Broadcast(packet->getDestAddr())) {
00437       //unicast
00438       debugEV << "(4) FSM State TRANSMITFRAME_4, "
00439          << "EV_FRAME_TRANSMITTED [Unicast]: ";
00440     } else {
00441       //broadcast
00442       debugEV << "(27) FSM State TRANSMITFRAME_4, EV_FRAME_TRANSMITTED "
00443          << " [Broadcast]";
00444       expectAck = false;
00445     }
00446 
00447     if(expectAck) {
00448       debugEV << "RadioSetupRx -> WAITACK." << endl;
00449       updateMacState(WAITACK_5);
00450       startTimer(TIMER_RX_ACK);
00451     } else {
00452       debugEV << ": RadioSetupRx, manageQueue..." << endl;
00453       macQueue.pop_front();
00454       delete packet;
00455       manageQueue();
00456     }
00457   } else {
00458     fsmError(event, msg);
00459   }
00460 }
00461 
00462 void csma::updateStatusWaitAck(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00463   assert(useMACAcks);
00464 
00465   cMessage * mac;
00466   switch (event) {
00467   case EV_ACK_RECEIVED:
00468     debugEV<< "(5) FSM State WAITACK_5, EV_ACK_RECEIVED: "
00469     << " ProcessAck, manageQueue..." << endl;
00470     if(rxAckTimer->isScheduled())
00471     cancelEvent(rxAckTimer);
00472     mac = static_cast<cMessage *>(macQueue.front());
00473     macQueue.pop_front();
00474     txAttempts = 0;
00475     mac->setName("MAC SUCCESS");
00476     mac->setKind(TX_OVER);
00477     sendControlUp(mac);
00478     delete msg;
00479     manageQueue();
00480     break;
00481   case EV_ACK_TIMEOUT:
00482     debugEV << "(12) FSM State WAITACK_5, EV_ACK_TIMEOUT:"
00483     << " incrementCounter/dropPacket, manageQueue..." << endl;
00484     manageMissingAck(event, msg);
00485     break;
00486   case EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED:
00487   case EV_FRAME_RECEIVED:
00488     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt*>(msg)));
00489     break;
00490   case EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED:
00491     debugEV << "Error ! Received a frame during SIFS !" << endl;
00492     delete msg;
00493     break;
00494   default:
00495     fsmError(event, msg);
00496     break;
00497   }
00498 
00499 }
00500 
00501 void csma::manageMissingAck(t_mac_event /*event*/, cMessage */*msg*/) {
00502   if (txAttempts < macMaxFrameRetries + 1) {
00503     // increment counter
00504     txAttempts++;
00505     debugEV<< "I will retransmit this packet (I already tried "
00506     << txAttempts << " times)." << endl;
00507   } else {
00508     // drop packet
00509     debugEV << "Packet was transmitted " << txAttempts
00510     << " times and I never got an Ack. I drop the packet." << endl;
00511     cMessage * mac = macQueue.front();
00512     macQueue.pop_front();
00513     txAttempts = 0;
00514     mac->setName("MAC ERROR");
00515     mac->setKind(PACKET_DROPPED);
00516     sendControlUp(mac);
00517   }
00518   manageQueue();
00519 }
00520 void csma::updateStatusSIFS(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00521   assert(useMACAcks);
00522 
00523   switch (event) {
00524   case EV_TIMER_SIFS:
00525     debugEV<< "(17) FSM State WAITSIFS_6, EV_TIMER_SIFS:"
00526     << " sendAck -> TRANSMITACK." << endl;
00527     updateMacState(TRANSMITACK_7);
00528     attachSignal(ackMessage, simTime());
00529     sendDown(ackMessage);
00530     nbTxAcks++;
00531     //    sendDelayed(ackMessage, aTurnaroundTime, lowerLayerOut);
00532     ackMessage = NULL;
00533     break;
00534   case EV_TIMER_BACKOFF:
00535     // Backoff timer has expired while receiving a frame. Restart it
00536     // and stay here.
00537     debugEV << "(16) FSM State WAITSIFS_6, EV_TIMER_BACKOFF. "
00538     << "Restart backoff timer and don't move." << endl;
00539     startTimer(TIMER_BACKOFF);
00540     break;
00541   case EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED:
00542   case EV_FRAME_RECEIVED:
00543     EV << "Error ! Received a frame during SIFS !" << endl;
00544     sendUp(decapsMsg(static_cast<MacPkt*>(msg)));
00545     delete msg;
00546     break;
00547   default:
00548     fsmError(event, msg);
00549     break;
00550   }
00551 }
00552 
00553 void csma::updateStatusTransmitAck(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00554   assert(useMACAcks);
00555 
00556   if (event == EV_FRAME_TRANSMITTED) {
00557     debugEV<< "(19) FSM State TRANSMITACK_7, EV_FRAME_TRANSMITTED:"
00558     << " ->manageQueue." << endl;
00559     phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00560     //    delete msg;
00561     manageQueue();
00562   } else {
00563     fsmError(event, msg);
00564   }
00565 }
00566 
00567 void csma::updateStatusNotIdle(cMessage *msg) {
00568   debugEV<< "(20) FSM State NOT IDLE, EV_SEND_REQUEST. Is a TxBuffer available ?" << endl;
00569   if (macQueue.size() <= queueLength) {
00570     macQueue.push_back(static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg));
00571     debugEV << "(21) FSM State NOT IDLE, EV_SEND_REQUEST"
00572     <<" and [TxBuff avail]: enqueue packet and don't move." << endl;
00573   } else {
00574     // queue is full, message has to be deleted
00575     debugEV << "(22) FSM State NOT IDLE, EV_SEND_REQUEST"
00576     << " and [TxBuff not avail]: dropping packet and don't move."
00577     << endl;
00578     msg->setName("MAC ERROR");
00579     msg->setKind(PACKET_DROPPED);
00580     sendControlUp(msg);
00581     droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::QUEUE);
00582     emit(BaseLayer::catDroppedPacketSignal, &droppedPacket);
00583   }
00584 
00585 }
00589 void csma::executeMac(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00590   debugEV<< "In executeMac" << endl;
00591   if(macState != IDLE_1 && event == EV_SEND_REQUEST) {
00592     updateStatusNotIdle(msg);
00593   } else {
00594     switch(macState) {
00595     case IDLE_1:
00596       updateStatusIdle(event, msg);
00597       break;
00598     case BACKOFF_2:
00599       updateStatusBackoff(event, msg);
00600       break;
00601     case CCA_3:
00602       updateStatusCCA(event, msg);
00603       break;
00604     case TRANSMITFRAME_4:
00605       updateStatusTransmitFrame(event, msg);
00606       break;
00607     case WAITACK_5:
00608       updateStatusWaitAck(event, msg);
00609       break;
00610     case WAITSIFS_6:
00611       updateStatusSIFS(event, msg);
00612       break;
00613     case TRANSMITACK_7:
00614       updateStatusTransmitAck(event, msg);
00615       break;
00616     default:
00617       EV << "Error in CSMA FSM: an unknown state has been reached. macState=" << macState << endl;
00618       break;
00619     }
00620   }
00621 }
00622 
00623 void csma::manageQueue() {
00624   if (macQueue.size() != 0) {
00625     debugEV<< "(manageQueue) there are " << macQueue.size() << " packets to send, entering backoff wait state." << endl;
00626     if( transmissionAttemptInterruptedByRx) {
00627       // resume a transmission cycle which was interrupted by
00628       // a frame reception during CCA check
00629       transmissionAttemptInterruptedByRx = false;
00630     } else {
00631       // initialize counters if we start a new transmission
00632       // cycle from zero
00633       NB = 0;
00634       //BE = macMinBE;
00635     }
00636     if(! backoffTimer->isScheduled()) {
00637       startTimer(TIMER_BACKOFF);
00638     }
00639     updateMacState(BACKOFF_2);
00640   } else {
00641     debugEV << "(manageQueue) no packets to send, entering IDLE state." << endl;
00642     updateMacState(IDLE_1);
00643   }
00644 }
00645 
00646 void csma::updateMacState(t_mac_states newMacState) {
00647   macState = newMacState;
00648 }
00649 
00650 /*
00651  * Called by the FSM machine when an unknown transition is requested.
00652  */
00653 void csma::fsmError(t_mac_event event, cMessage *msg) {
00654   EV<< "FSM Error ! In state " << macState << ", received unknown event:" << event << "." << endl;
00655   if (msg != NULL)
00656   delete msg;
00657 }
00658 
00659 void csma::startTimer(t_mac_timer timer) {
00660   if (timer == TIMER_BACKOFF) {
00661     scheduleAt(scheduleBackoff(), backoffTimer);
00662   } else if (timer == TIMER_CCA) {
00663     simtime_t ccaTime = rxSetupTime + ccaDetectionTime;
00664     debugEV<< "(startTimer) ccaTimer value=" << ccaTime
00665     << "(rxSetupTime,ccaDetectionTime:" << rxSetupTime
00666     << "," << ccaDetectionTime <<")." << endl;
00667     scheduleAt(simTime()+rxSetupTime+ccaDetectionTime, ccaTimer);
00668   } else if (timer==TIMER_SIFS) {
00669     assert(useMACAcks);
00670     debugEV << "(startTimer) sifsTimer value=" << sifs << endl;
00671     scheduleAt(simTime()+sifs, sifsTimer);
00672   } else if (timer==TIMER_RX_ACK) {
00673     assert(useMACAcks);
00674     debugEV << "(startTimer) rxAckTimer value=" << macAckWaitDuration << endl;
00675     scheduleAt(simTime()+macAckWaitDuration, rxAckTimer);
00676   } else {
00677     EV << "Unknown timer requested to start:" << timer << endl;
00678   }
00679 }
00680 
00681 simtime_t csma::scheduleBackoff() {
00682 
00683   simtime_t backoffTime;
00684 
00685   switch(backoffMethod) {
00686   case EXPONENTIAL:
00687   {
00688     int BE = std::min(macMinBE + NB, macMaxBE);
00689     int v = (1 << BE) - 1;
00690     int r = intuniform(0, v, 0);
00691     backoffTime = r * aUnitBackoffPeriod;
00692 
00693     debugEV<< "(startTimer) backoffTimer value=" << backoffTime
00694     << " (BE=" << BE << ", 2^BE-1= " << v << "r="
00695     << r << ")" << endl;
00696     break;
00697   }
00698   case LINEAR:
00699   {
00700     int slots = intuniform(1, initialCW + NB, 0);
00701     backoffTime = slots * aUnitBackoffPeriod;
00702     debugEV<< "(startTimer) backoffTimer value=" << backoffTime << endl;
00703     break;
00704   }
00705   case CONSTANT:
00706   {
00707     int slots = intuniform(1, initialCW, 0);
00708     backoffTime = slots * aUnitBackoffPeriod;
00709     debugEV<< "(startTimer) backoffTimer value=" << backoffTime << endl;
00710     break;
00711   }
00712   default:
00713     error("Unknown backoff method!");
00714     break;
00715   }
00716 
00717   nbBackoffs = nbBackoffs + 1;
00718   backoffValues = backoffValues + SIMTIME_DBL(backoffTime);
00719 
00720   return backoffTime + simTime();
00721 }
00722 
00723 /*
00724  * Binds timers to events and executes FSM.
00725  */
00726 void csma::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00727   debugEV<< "timer routine." << endl;
00728   if(msg==backoffTimer)
00729     executeMac(EV_TIMER_BACKOFF, msg);
00730   else if(msg==ccaTimer)
00731     executeMac(EV_TIMER_CCA, msg);
00732   else if(msg==sifsTimer)
00733     executeMac(EV_TIMER_SIFS, msg);
00734   else if(msg==rxAckTimer) {
00735     nbMissedAcks++;
00736     executeMac(EV_ACK_TIMEOUT, msg);
00737   } else
00738     EV << "CSMA Error: unknown timer fired:" << msg << endl;
00739 }
00740 
00745 void csma::handleLowerMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00746   MacPkt*                 macPkt     = static_cast<MacPkt *> (msg);
00747   const LAddress::L2Type& src        = macPkt->getSrcAddr();
00748   const LAddress::L2Type& dest       = macPkt->getDestAddr();
00749   long                    ExpectedNr = 0;
00750 
00751   debugEV<< "Received frame name= " << macPkt->getName()
00752   << ", myState=" << macState << " src=" << macPkt->getSrcAddr()
00753   << " dst=" << macPkt->getDestAddr() << " myAddr="
00754   << myMacAddr << endl;
00755 
00756   if(macPkt->getDestAddr() == myMacAddr)
00757   {
00758     if(!useMACAcks) {
00759       debugEV << "Received a data packet addressed to me." << endl;
00760 //      nbRxFrames++;
00761       executeMac(EV_FRAME_RECEIVED, macPkt);
00762     }
00763     else {
00764       long SeqNr = macPkt->getSequenceId();
00765 
00766       if(strcmp(macPkt->getName(), "CSMA-Ack") != 0) {
00767         // This is a data message addressed to us
00768         // and we should send an ack.
00769         // we build the ack packet here because we need to
00770         // copy data from macPkt (src).
00771         debugEV << "Received a data packet addressed to me,"
00772            << " preparing an ack..." << endl;
00773 
00774 //        nbRxFrames++;
00775 
00776         if(ackMessage != NULL)
00777           delete ackMessage;
00778         ackMessage = new MacPkt("CSMA-Ack");
00779         ackMessage->setSrcAddr(myMacAddr);
00780         ackMessage->setDestAddr(macPkt->getSrcAddr());
00781         ackMessage->setBitLength(ackLength);
00782         //Check for duplicates by checking expected seqNr of sender
00783         if(SeqNrChild.find(src) == SeqNrChild.end()) {
00784           //no record of current child -> add expected next number to map
00785           SeqNrChild[src] = SeqNr + 1;
00786           debugEV << "Adding a new child to the map of Sequence numbers:" << src << endl;
00787           executeMac(EV_FRAME_RECEIVED, macPkt);
00788         }
00789         else {
00790           ExpectedNr = SeqNrChild[src];
00791           debugEV << "Expected Sequence number is " << ExpectedNr <<
00792           " and number of packet is " << SeqNr << endl;
00793           if(SeqNr < ExpectedNr) {
00794             //Duplicate Packet, count and do not send to upper layer
00795             nbDuplicates++;
00796             executeMac(EV_DUPLICATE_RECEIVED, macPkt);
00797           }
00798           else {
00799             SeqNrChild[src] = SeqNr + 1;
00800             executeMac(EV_FRAME_RECEIVED, macPkt);
00801           }
00802         }
00803 
00804       } else if(macQueue.size() != 0) {
00805 
00806         // message is an ack, and it is for us.
00807         // Is it from the right node ?
00808         MacPkt * firstPacket = static_cast<MacPkt *>(macQueue.front());
00809         if(macPkt->getSrcAddr() == firstPacket->getDestAddr()) {
00810           nbRecvdAcks++;
00811           executeMac(EV_ACK_RECEIVED, macPkt);
00812         } else {
00813           EV << "Error! Received an ack from an unexpected source: src=" << macPkt->getSrcAddr() << ", I was expecting from node addr=" << firstPacket->getDestAddr() << endl;
00814           delete macPkt;
00815         }
00816       } else {
00817         EV << "Error! Received an Ack while my send queue was empty. src=" << macPkt->getSrcAddr() << "." << endl;
00818         delete macPkt;
00819       }
00820     }
00821   }
00822   else if (LAddress::isL2Broadcast(dest)) {
00823     executeMac(EV_BROADCAST_RECEIVED, macPkt);
00824   } else {
00825     debugEV << "packet not for me, deleting...\n";
00826     delete macPkt;
00827   }
00828 }
00829 
00830 void csma::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg) {
00831   if (msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::TX_OVER) {
00832     executeMac(EV_FRAME_TRANSMITTED, msg);
00833   } else if (msg->getKind() == BaseDecider::PACKET_DROPPED) {
00834     debugEV<< "control message: PACKED DROPPED" << endl;
00835   } else if (msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER) {
00836     debugEV<< "control message: RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER" << endl;
00837   } else {
00838     EV << "Invalid control message type (type=NOTHING) : name="
00839     << msg->getName() << " modulesrc="
00840     << msg->getSenderModule()->getFullPath()
00841     << "." << endl;
00842   }
00843   delete msg;
00844 }
00845 
00846 cPacket *csma::decapsMsg(MacPkt * macPkt) {
00847   cPacket * msg = macPkt->decapsulate();
00848   setUpControlInfo(msg, macPkt->getSrcAddr());
00849 
00850   return msg;
00851 }
